The viper left its cave.
It always remains open-mouthed.
When it's hit, it spills fresh blood.
(Or maybe it's the body of a man)
"Behind his elbows, an unattached cord suddenly arises.
A bellows suddenly spreads out in front of the wind.
Naṭa's eight arms are empty and melancholy.
At midnight and three watches in the evening, he travels by daylight.
(Tiantong Jing) Yangqi's gold ring and chestnut canopy.
They swallow and jump depending on the differences in previous events.
The ocean all comes down in one gulp.
There's no more north, south, or west, and there's no more east, south, or west.
(Zhaotang I) The ocean is covered with incense and bait.
The sky is covered with nets.
He follows others who jump and swallow.
I just laugh and smile.
(Tiantong Wu)
Eighteen lions to the east.
Eighteen lions to the west ...
18 lions to the south ...
Eighteen li to the north.
There's no help, and nothing to prevent it.
There are eight cold spells and eight hot spells.
They'll be cast into the animal kingdom.
That's the end of their hellish crimes.
(Han guan yu) Yang Qi asked the monks.
"Where did the highway come from that's so deep and remote?
He said there are no four walls in the sky.
The master said, "How many cursives have been broken?
The saṃgha then shouted.

source_sentence: 師曰一喝兩喝又作麼生。
translation: The teacher said, "What's the point of one or two shouts?
He said, "Look at this old monk.
The teacher said.
"The staff isn't here.
Why don't you sit down and have some tea?
"How did the Gaochao come to fish for elephants and rhinoceroses?
He turned around and didn't carry any dirt with him.
Suddenly, he gave a shout that was a thousand zhang high.
Who can tell from looking outside the kalpas?
(Master Guitang) Zongjian falin vol. 30
